## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been hearing a lot about the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace. Can you tell me more about it and how it works?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs on-chain. It allows users to advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT on the blockchain for everyone to see. The platform enables peer-to-peer transactions, eliminating the need for intermediaries. Users can execute transactions from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, and still have the ability to audit their transactions.

**User:**
That sounds really interesting! What about security, though? I've heard of Verus Vault - what is it, and how does it protect funds on a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus Vault is a feature that allows users to lock their VerusID, protecting their funds from theft or unauthorized access, even if their private key is compromised. When a VerusID is locked with Vault, users cannot spend funds from that identity until it is unlocked again. However, users can still receive funds and stake their locked funds on the Verus network to earn rewards.

**User:**
That's great to know! I'd like to enable these features on my own VerusID. What are the requirements for enabling revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault capabilities on a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
To enable revocation, recovery, and Verus Vault capabilities on a VerusID, users must have at least one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured. That's the basic setup needed to take advantage of these advanced security features.
What is the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and how does it work?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs on-chain. It allows users to advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT on the blockchain for everyone to see. The platform enables peer-to-peer transactions, eliminating the need for intermediaries. Users can execute transactions from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, and still have the ability to audit their transactions.

## Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.## Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
